description: Dive into this easy dinner recipe featuring the tropical flavour combo of chicken, pineapple and slaw.
keywords: Coleslaw,Low saturated fat,Pineapple,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,High protein,High fibre,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat
name: Easy Chicken, Pineapple & Golden Citrus Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle chicken with 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil. Season. Heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium- high heat. Cook chicken, for 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Slice.
Peel and core pineapple. Quarter lengthways. Drizzle with 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil. Increase heat to high. Cook for 2 minutes on each side or until charred. Transfer to a chopping board.
Chop pineapple. Place salad kit in a bowl, reserving dressing and dried fruit sachet. Add pineapple to salad. Toss to combine.
Top salad with chicken, drizzle over reserved dressing and scatter over reserved dried fruit. Serve with toasted bread.
